title: Graduate Software Development - Hong Kong
content:
Here at Wiley Edge, we pair talented graduates with leading global businesses. We’re always on the lookout for ambitious graduates to join Wiley Edge Alumni Graduate Program, kick-starting your tech career within an entry-level Software Developer role and working onsite with a leading investment bank, located in Hong Kong. Our 24-month graduate program begins with 6-8 weeks of paid training and career coaching, where you’ll learn everything you need to hit the ground running as a Software Developer. What you’ll do: If successful, you’ll work with one of our clients as a software developer designing, building, testing and maintaining scalable and stable off the shelf application or custom-built technology solutions.
Participate and contribute in the entire implementation process for new applications and enhancements to existing applications
Provide input on the overall solution design
Build and test applications
Meet with business partners to understand business needs
Conduct root cause analysis and implement basic performance tuning
Responsible for ensuring the solution meets business needs
 What you need:
B.S., Computer Science, MIS or within a STEM related subject
3.0 GPA or higher
Development experience
Solid software engineering principles (data structures, OO, design patterns, multithreading)
Good trouble shooting and debugging skills
Understanding of COBOL, JAVA, JSP, Supertool, PL/SQL, UNIX shell scripting, etc. Amisys, Facets or other claims management system experience a plus.
Working knowledge of database concepts (SQL, stored procs, schema design)
Understanding of the formal software development lifecycle (SDLC)
Understanding of test-driven development
 What you’ll receive:
Fully paid, in-depth and interactive training with a diverse group of like-minded graduates, delivered by experts with working knowledge of the field.
A competitive graduate salary
Pay increases every 6 months
A flexible benefits package 
Ongoing training and pastoral care
Invaluable industry experience and the opportunity to start a career in a desirable and competitive industry

demographic_questions.description:
Wiley Edge is actively committed to Diversity and the principles of Employment Equity and invites applications from all Qualified Candidate Groups. Women, members of Visible Minorities, People with Disabilities and people of the LGBTQ community are especially encouraged to apply and voluntarily self-identify as a member of a designated group as part of their application. All Candidates are asked to complete and include the self-identification form with their application.

Why we are asking you to Self-Identify?

Equity, Diversity and Inclusivity (EDI) strengthen the STEM community, Wiley Edge, client offices and the impact of the work created and performed.


Privacy Notice Statement 

Although self-identifying is encouraged, refraining from participating will have NO consequences on your application. The collection, use, disclosure, retention and disposal of your personal information are in accordance with the Access to Information Act and the Privacy Act.

The self-identifying information you provide will be stored electronically upon your submission and access is limited to the HR team as well as other staff members on a need to know basis. Your self-identification information is not part of your application, and is neither accessible to, nor shared with, external reviewers and/or team members in an identifiable form. Wiley Edge shares aggregated EDI data on a regular basis internally and with clients to monitor the success of their efforts in meeting their equity and diversity targets. Wiley Edge never shares self-identification data specific to an individual. In providing this data, you acknowledge this application of the data.

If you believe your personal information has been mishandled or have concerns about Wiley Edge's privacy practices, you have the right to file a complaint at APACHR@WileyEdge.com 

By submitting your self-identification information, you are confirming that you have read and understood this Privacy Statement and agree to provide your personal information in accordance with it.

Definition of Disability

"Person with disability" means a person with long term physical, mental, intellectual or sensory impairment which, in interaction with barriers, hinders his full and effective participation in society equally with others.

"Person with benchmark disability" means a person with not less than forty per cent. of a specified disability where specified disability has not been defined in measurable terms and includes a person with disability where specified disability has been defined in measurable terms, as certified by the certifying authority.

questions.label: How would you describe your gender identity?
How would you describe your sexual orientation? (mark all that apply)

Do you have a disability or chronic condition (physical, visual, auditory, cognitive, mental, emotional, other) that substantially limits one/ more of your major life activities, including mobility, communication, and learning?
Please specify what kind of adjustments you would need to participate with respect to your disability in the Wiley Edge program

Do you have permanent and unrestricted authorization to work in Hong Kong?
Have you previously been employed by our organization?
Would you require a visa sponsorship in the near future?

questions.description:
In order to move forward, you must consent to our privacy policy and terms of service.


- By submitting your information, you confirm you have read the Privacy Policy.
- By selecting Text/SMS, you authorize Wiley’s Edge to contact you via SMS. Message and data rates may apply. Terms.
- By joining our talent network, you are consenting to our organization and our affiliates collecting your personal data and, according to your preferences, contacting you by e-mail, phone or SMS about news, information, events, and job opportunities at our organization that may be of interest.
- By using this service, you agree that we may place cookies on your device and you acknowledge that your personal information may be transferred to other countries if necessary in our hiring process.
questions.label: Privacy Consent

values.label: I agree to the use of my personal information and to being contacted by email and text/SMS as described in our privacy notice and terms of service.
